titles.title: Recognizing the 96th anniversary of the founding of the Democratic Republic of Azerbaijan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, and Emerging Threats.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
5/28/2014--Introduced. Congratulates the people of Azerbaijan as they celebrate Republic Day on the 96th anniversary of the Democratic Republic of Azerbaijan's founding.
Notes Azerbaijan's important role in ensuring the energy security of Israel and other American allies in Europe.
Supports U.S.-Azerbaijan cooperation on energy, security, and other matters.
